case.name: Sei Anal
case.description: Sei asks people at the table if they engage or are interested in anal. Some players may enjoy this. [Any hand]

trigger.state: Does anyone here like anal? I figure if you have a few drinks and are open to new experiences...
Does anyone do anal? I mean, I'm a little drunk and curious is all.

case.name: Drinks, anyone?
case.description: For her first hand after losing her first item, Sei offers to buy a round of drinks for the party.

trigger.state: You know, I have a good feeling about these cards. Deal, a round on me! What'll everyone else take?

notes.note: This case was hidden due to no longer making sense after changes were made to the targeted character. If you're rewriting this character, feel free to delete it.
This case was hidden due to no longer making sense after changes were made to the targeted character. If you're rewriting this character, feel free to delete it.
